headline: Syd Mead, Who Envisioned the Future and Then Designed It, Is Dead at 86
abstract: In a wide-ranging career, he designed cars, restaurants and, most notably, the otherworldly look of science-fiction movies.
lead_paragraph: Syd Mead, a designer whose wide-ranging work included envisioning vehicles of the future as well as helping to shape the look of environments in movies like “Blade Runner,” “Tron” and “Aliens,” died on Monday at his home in Pasadena, Calif. He was 86.
